Search P2P

p2p_search.Rd

Search P2P

p2p_search(coin, fiat, side, pay_types = c(), page = NA, rows = 10)

Arguments

coin

Coin.
fiat

Fiat currency.
side

Side of the trade: "BUY" or "SELL".
pay_types

Options for payment. One or more of "BANK", "WECHAT" or "ALIPAY". The default, c(), allows all payment options.
page

Page number. If NA then get all pages.
rows

Number of records per page.

Value

A data frame.

Examples

# Grab the first page.
p2p_search("ETH", "USD", side = "BUY", page = 1)

#> # A tibble: 10 × 10
#>    advert_id  side  asset fiat  price available min_amount max_amount advertiser
#>    <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl> <list>    
#>  1 112938708… BUY   ETH   USD   4316.    0.0455         50      150   <tibble […
#>  2 112908393… BUY   ETH   USD   4387.    0.254          20     1000   <tibble […
#>  3 112883126… BUY   ETH   USD   4390.    0.0262         11      110   <tibble […
#>  4 112627973… BUY   ETH   USD   4394.    0.199          30      876.  <tibble […
#>  5 112561293… BUY   ETH   USD   4398.    0.0110         20       48.2 <tibble […
#>  6 112954263… BUY   ETH   USD   4399.    1.16          100     5082.  <tibble […
#>  7 112940051… BUY   ETH   USD   4400.    0.146         100      640.  <tibble […
#>  8 112609669… BUY   ETH   USD   4401.    0.337          50     1000   <tibble […
#>  9 112876008… BUY   ETH   USD   4403.    0.175         100      772.  <tibble […
#> 10 112822947… BUY   ETH   USD   4419.    0.961         100     2000   <tibble […
#> # … with 1 more variable: payment <list>
# Grab all pages.
p2p_search("BUSD", "CAD", side = "BUY")
